name: No Time to Dice 🎲
description:
IT’S DICEY OVER HERE!

You’ve just managed to sneak out of your parent house to get a signed copy of your favorite comic book. Good for you, but a quick look at your super cool brand new digital watch tells you that you are already late home and your mom's expecting you… Time to hurry up!

But wait, something is weird… Is it just me or the world is now full of unusual trials? And hey, look at that! There are also cute talking dice who want to help you! It’s time to go for a great adventure!

On desktop, the game is best played using a mouse
On mobile, please switch your phone to landscape mode

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022
